product_name: Asolo Reston WP Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: Hike to your favorite destination in the comfortable and supportive Asolo Reston WP hiking boots. They're a great choice for day hikes and multi-day adventures. Water-resistant suede leather uppers with high-tenacity polyester underlays deliver durable flexibility and support while remaining breathable. Waterproof, breathable membranes keep feet dry; wicking nylon linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for fast drying. Gusseted scree tongues and padded ankle cuffs add protective comfort at ankles; rubber toe bumpers protect against impact and abrasion. Lightweight molded EVA midsoles provide cushioning comfort and shock absorption. Thermoplastic urethane shanks offer torsional rigidity and support. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles are optimized for weight savings without compromising traction for handling mixed terrain.
short_description: Hike to your favorite destination in the comfortable and supportive Asolo Reston WP hiking boots. They're a great choice for day hikes and multi-day adventures.
